comment.author: 68512117@N02
comment._content:
Crew posed in front of B-24D  41-24055  "80 DAYS"  14AF 308BG 374BS
Standing L-R:
John Malen - navigator
Dean Huffman - pilot
Stanley Robinson - bombardier
Dale Younger - copilot
Kneeling L-R:
Don Schell - armorer/ball turret gunner
Eugene Odermutt - radio operator
Tony Tricoli - top turret gunner
Gerard Labrie - assistant radio operator
Larry Cooney - tail turret gunner
John Stambaugh - engineer

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
